name: RemovalOfImplantedDeviceProsthesesFromHipKnee
title: Removal of implanted device/prostheses from hip/knee
description:
This set of values identifies patients who have removal of implanted device/prostheses from hip/knee.

NOTE:  VALUE SET UNDER DEVELOPMENT AS MEASURE TESTING IS ONGOING.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have removal of implanted device/prostheses from hip/knee.),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Removal of autologous/nonautologous tissue substitute, external/internal fixations, liner, resurfacing device, spacers, synthetic substitute),(Exclusion Criteria: Partial hip/knee replacements, revisions, resurfacing, total hip and total knee replacements are excluded.)
